dcterms:creator: Arijit Sehanobish

dcterms:description: The dataset contains data for training a neural network to predict the potential in the Schrödinger equation for the harmonic oscillator, demonstrating the accuracy and stability of the Metropolis potential neural network (MPNN).
dcterms:title: Harmonic Oscillator

dcterms:creator: Arijit Sehanobish
Hector H. Corzo
Onur Kara
David van Dijk
dcterms:description: The dataset includes data for training a neural network to predict the potential in the Schrödinger equation for the hydrogen atom, showcasing the performance of the Metropolis potential neural network (MPNN).
dcterms:title: Hydrogen Atom

dcterms:creator: Nicholas Metropolis

dcterms:description: This dataset is used for obtaining training data through Metropolis sampling, which allows for efficient sampling of configurations in statistical mechanics.
dcterms:title: Metropolis Sampling

dcterms:creator: B. A. Berg
dcterms:description: This dataset encompasses various quantum Monte Carlo approaches that are utilized for simulations in quantum mechanics, providing a framework for understanding quantum systems.
dcterms:title: Quantum Monte Carlo Approaches

dcterms:creator: W. M. C. Foulkes
L. Mitas
R. J. Needs
G. Rajagopal
dcterms:description: This dataset includes results from quantum Monte Carlo simulations of solids, which are essential for understanding the properties of materials at the quantum level.
dcterms:title: Quantum Monte Carlo Simulations
